1428.name: 4009 Ti
1428.Applications: This alloy can be used for welding martensitic-ferritic steels , steel castings and for hardfacing exhaust valves.
1428.Suitable_For: X6Cr13 -1.4000, X6CrAl13 - 1.4002, X10Cr13 - 1.4006, X15Cr13 - 1.4024, Steel castings: G-X10Cr13 – 1.4006, martensitic steel, cast steel, cladding exhaust valves
